headline.main: MIDDLE EAST READY FOR GERMAN DRIVES; British in Iraq and Iran Much Stronger Than a Year Ago -- U.S. Fliers Reported in Area MORE EQUIPMENT SOUGHT Workers in America and Britain Urged to Speed Output -- Lines in Region Are Built Up

lead_paragraph: BAGHDAD, Iraq, March 30 (Delayed) -- It has been nearly a year since British and Imperial forces entered Irap to quell Rashid el Gailani's German-inspired uprising. During that time much satisfactory progress has been made toward full exploitation of the military position of the United Nations in the Middle East.
abstract: Allied troops under Lt Gen Quinan ready for possible German drive in Iran and Iraq; U S fliers reptd in area

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
